sentences.en: ...the presumption that a defendant is innocent until proved guilty.
sentences.cn: …在被证明有罪之前被告为无罪的假定。

sentences.en: A leisurely process of decision - making creates a presumption in favor of eventual inaction.
sentences.cn: 不慌不忙地作决定就会使人猜测是打算不了了之.

sentences.en: He had the presumption to criticize my work.
sentences.cn: 他居然厚着脸皮批评起我的作品[工作]来.

sentences.en: I don't think that's a false presumption.
sentences.cn: 我认为那并不是错误的推测.

sentences.en: In effect, the Florida East Coast decision created a strong presumption in favor of informal rulemaking.
sentences.cn: 实际上, "佛罗里达东海岸"案的裁决造成了坚决赞成非正式规则制定的推论.

sentences.en: It is a very interesting presumption.
It is not presumption on my part.
It is presumption to go to a party when one has not been invited.
sentences.cn: 未被邀请而去参加宴会是冒昧的.

sentences.en: Please pardon my presumption in writing to you.
sentences.cn: 请原谅我很冒昧地写信给你.

sentences.en: She was enraged by his presumption.
She was indignant with his presumption and self - satisfaction and conscious rectitude.
sentences.cn: 她恼火他的傲慢自满和自以为是.

sentences.en: The presumption is that he had lost his way.
sentences.cn: 推想起来,他当时是迷了路.

sentences.en: The presumption is that he will refuse.
There is a general presumption that the doctor knows best.
sentences.cn: 一般人都以为医生最了解情况。

sentences.en: They may be hoping to invert the presumption that a defendant is innocent until proved guilty.
sentences.cn: 他们可能有望颠覆“被告在证实有罪之前是无辜的”这一假设。

sentences.en: They were angered by his presumption.
sentences.cn: 他们对他的放肆感到非常愤怒。

sentences.en: Who was it that had the dashing presumption to do that?
sentences.cn: 是谁这样大胆专横,使出这一手 呢 ?

trans.tran_cn: 推测，设想，放肆，傲慢，<律>推定
trans.tran_en: something that you think is true because it is very likely
